text:
@SpeakerPelosi @WHO Senselessness? What? Not bloody likely. The WHO lied to the whole world from the get go. They ABSOLUTELY lied. Proud to have a President that actually stands up for AMERICA. All you Democrats do is apologize. Obama was the KING of apology.
